sents: Prince George, B.C.- Construction of the new RiverBend Seniors housing project in Prince George is well underway, but it’s a project that almost didn’t happen.
He says it wasn’t until Mayor Lyn Hall was elected that the wheels were set in motion.
She and her husband are among those who have already purchased a unit and expect to move to their new condo in the fall of 2017.
“We were at the point of knowing we would need to move, but didn’t want to move into any of the existing facilities in Prince George.”
